Docs.summary: Describes the referential constraints on the relationships in a conceptual model.
Gets the built-in type kind for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReferentialConstraint">.

Docs.summary: Gets the list of properties for the "from role" on which this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReferentialConstraint"> is defined.
Docs.value: A collection of type <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601> that contains the list of properties for "from role" on which this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReferentialConstraint> is defined.

Docs.summary: Gets the "from role" that takes part in this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReferentialConstraint">.

Docs.summary: Gets the list of properties for the "to role" on which this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReferentialConstraint"> is defined.
Docs.value: A collection of type <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601> that contains the list of properties for the "to role" on which this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReferentialConstraint> is defined.

Docs.summary: Gets the "to role" that takes part in this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReferentialConstraint">.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipEndMember"> object that represents the "to role" that takes part in this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReferentialConstraint>.
